content:
Introduction to HTML by jpowell@scholar.lib.vt.edu

The original of this may be found at
http://scholar.lib.vt.edu/reports/soasis-slides/HTML-Intro.html
There, its title is Introduction to HTML and internal comments say ``For Spinning the World Wide Web, Cincinati, Ohio September 19-20, 1994 SOASIS.''

This copy at UC Irvine is for use in ICS 1C, Winter 1995.

At the bottom of each page, click on
>>> to go on.

This information brought to you by www.ics.uci.edu
Current as of 29 january 1995
Please send comments to ics1c@ics.uci.edu, including the URL to which your comments apply.
